item.title: Basics
item.description: Telegram Bot Basics Register a Bot First of all, you need to create a bot in Telegram. There is a special bot for this purpose - @BotFather. Open chat with BotFather and press “Start” to start chat with it. It will show you help message to guide through the steps: Click /newbot link in the help message, or send /newbot message to chat. Then BotFather will ask you for the name of your bot.

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Quick Start Installation go get github.com/yanzay/tbot/v2 Usage Simple usage example: package main import ( "log" "os" "time" "github.com/yanzay/tbot/v2" ) func main() { bot := tbot.New(os.Getenv("TELEGRAM_TOKEN")) c := bot.Client() bot.HandleMessage(".*yo.*", func(m *tbot.Message) { c.SendChatAction(m.Chat.ID, tbot.ActionTyping) time.Sleep(1 * time.Second) c.SendMessage(m.Chat.ID, "hello!") }) err := bot.Start() if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } }
